title: ITaperedTapElementData.UseStandardDepth
description: Gets or sets whether to use the standard offset distance for the end condition of this tapered tap hole element.
returns: True to use the standard offset distance, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IAdvancedHoleFeatureData::UseBaselineDimensions
is set to true.
If this property is set to false, then use
IAdvancedHoleElementData::OffsetDistance
to set the custom offset distance.
